Title: Boyz Crazy
Writer: Alex Hirsch (creator), Matt Chapman, Alex Hirsch
Actors: Lance Bass, Jason Ritter, Keith Ferguson, Ken Hudson Campbell
Plot: When Mabel Discovers that her favourite boy band is actually a bunch of imprisoned clones, she sets them free, only to decide on keeping them for herself; Dipper is convinced that Robbie plans to brainwash Wendy with a secret message.
